addi $5,$0,3			// 5 has 3
beq $0, $0, next		// true
add $6, $5, $0			// never reached
next: sw $5,4($5)		// sw from reg5 in memory
lw $7, 4($5)			// lw from memory to reg 7
add $8, $5, $7          // 8 has 6

001000 00000 00101 0000000000000011
000100 00000 00000 0000000000000001
000000 00101 00000 00110 00000 100000
101011 00101 00101 0000000000000100
100011 00101 00111 0000000000000100
00000000101001110100000000100000
